title: leaverbuster
body: i just leave one game on league of legends.then i instantly got a 20 min leaverbuster.why is this?help me

replies.body:
If this one game triggered a 20 minute LPQ punishment, then that means you have left several games in the past. Leaverbuster was designed with a bit of leniency so that your first few leaves won't trigger a punishment. The fact that you have the 20 minute LPQ shows that you have been punished by Leaverbuster a few times already. This means that you have already used up that leniency and then some in the past, so a single leave could very well trigger another punishment for you.

For more information about Leaverbuster, you can read this [FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714).
this is a new account and i only leave once on this account

Well it's impossible to see a Leaverbuster penalty without a *recent trend* of disconnections occurring on your account. Did you recently leave other matches or disconnect from any due to a technical issue?
